title: Blame mounts on Israel for Syrian air base strike
text:
Blame mounts on Israel for Syrian air base strike 1:13pm EDT - 01:52 
Russia's defense ministry says that Israeli warplanes were behind an airstrike on a Syrian airfield on early Monday morning. It follows reports of a chemical weapons attack in rebel territory that aid agencies killed dozens on Saturday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Russia's defense ministry says that Israeli warplanes were behind an airstrike on a Syrian airfield on early Monday morning. It follows reports of a chemical weapons attack in rebel territory that aid agencies killed dozens on Saturday.
